description: Whether chilly, damp weather hits on or off mountain, the Men's Highlander Down Hoody will keep you warm and dry. Windproof Pertex Quantum® fabric helps improve the efficiency of the lightweight 700-fill-power-down. Elastic binding at the hood and cuffs add extra weather protection. Zippered hand pockets provide a place to stash small gear.
name: Marmot Highlander Down Hoody - Mens
